co.uk.niadel.mpi.events

Class EventFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.uk.niadel.mpi.events.EventFactory

  • public final class EventFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Where events are fired/generated, and event handlers are registered. Replaces EventsList and allows for event handlers with annotations.
    Author:
    Niadel
